description.value:
A guardian staff is formed from ivory strands woven in a diamond pattern and capped with a glowing ruby. Those charged with protecting others value this staff's spells.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You raise the staff and choose an ally within 10 feet. A ruby-colored plane of force appears like a shield near the ally, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. If you use this action again, any creature you previously granted this bonus to loses it.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.oKtMGJa0qbxuZD7w]{Effect: Guardian Staff}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8xRzLhwGL7Dgy3EZ]{Sanctuary}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d7Lwx6KAs47MtF0q]{Shield Other}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HIY4XUJZKmFLAJTn]{Life Connection}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1b55SgYTV65JvmQd]{Blessing of Defiance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9W2Qv0wXLg6tQg3y]{Scintillating Safeguard}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
